channel.title: Projects on jotaro shigeyama
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on jotaro shigeyama

item.title: springFit: Joints and Mounts that Fabricate on Any Laser-Cutter
item.description:
SpringFit converts models in the form of 2D cutting plans by replacing all contained mounts, notch joints, finger joints, and t-joints.

Full-Paper presented in UIST 2019, New Orleans, LA, US

item.title: Project Transcalibur
item.description:
Weight Moving VR Controller for Dynamic Rendering of 2D Shape Using Haptic Shape Illusion





[Full-paper got awarded Honorable Mention at CHI2019]

item.title: DualPanto: A Haptic Device that Enables Blind Users to Continuously Interact with Virtual Worlds
item.description:
We present a new haptic device that enables blind users to continuously track the absolute position of moving objects in spatial virtual environments, as is the case in sports or shooter games.

Full-Paper presented in UIST 2018, Berlin, Germany

item.title: Self avatar pseudo-haptics in Virtual Reality
Swinging 3D Lamps
item.description: 2D images turn into 3D parallax motion by illusion. Collaborated work with Nami Ogawa

item.title: AgIC Workshop Collection installation design
item.description: An installation showed how conductive ink can design to be flexible.

item.title: JTRWatch
item.description: Smart watch prototype using Intel Edison

item.title: Lighting Coaster:AgIC Workshop design
item.description: AgIC tutorial designed for FAB10 Barcelona.

item.title: Project CoPRO
item.description: Optimization of condominium renovation based on reinforcement learning. Collaborated work with Takato Ishida and Chisato Hayakawa

item.title: Dokimakura:Hugging pillow with realistic haptic feedback
item.description: Designing physiological SNS, awarded 1st prize on hackathon by Yahoo!.

item.title: Farmbot
item.description: CNC agricultural robot for IoT farming.

item.title: Remote aerobotics project
item.description: Remote controlled and automatic attitude controlled airplane project.
